From: 
To: 
Subject RE: MCC Visit Thursday 
Date: Fri, 16 Aug 2019 11:21:02 +0000 
>, 
Thank you for your guidance during the tour. Please let us know if you have further questions or need anything else. It was 
great seeing you again. 
>>>" 
>  8/15/2019 2:17 PM >» 
Thank you both for everything today —  really appreciate it, and lovely to see you, as always! 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2019 9:40 AM 
To: 
>; 
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday 
Thanks! Ijust walked Mr. O'Callahan and over to meet with the Regional Director and new Warden. 
>>> 
" "  < 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2019 8:54 AM 
To: 
Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday 
>  8/15/2019 9:31 AM > » 
Sorry about the abrupt prior email. I was hoping to get the names so we could ensure we have enough vests for everyone. 
>>>  " 
>  8/14/2019 10:56 PM >>> 
Ijust found out that additional law enforcement agents will be joining but I don't know how many and who. I asked. I'm 
sorry! 
On Aug 14, 2019, at 12:49 PM, 
> 
wrote: 
<!--[if 
mso 
9]--> 
<!--[endifJ--> 
Resending, I got an error last time. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:41 PM 
To: 
>; 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday 
incipal Deputy Attorney General 
US

EFTA00032378

From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:26 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday 
Hi EM„ 
Not a problem. I will add them to the list. Do you have everyone's titles? 
I will advise the Warden of the request that he accompany us on the tour. 
Thank you, 
Supervisory Staff Attorney 
CLC New York 
Metropolitan Correctional Center 
150 Park Row 
New York, New York   10007 
> » " "  < 
Adam, 
Two additional people from DO1 will join the visit: 
8/14/2019 12:17 PM > » 
In addition, =as asked that the new acting warden join the tour. Let me know if you have any questions, thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 4:03 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday 
If it is not too much of an imposition, we ask that all visitors come to our front lobby for screening before admission. 
Thanks! 
Yes, thank you. Where should we go? 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 3:38 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday 
Hi a 
It should not be a problem. Does 10 am work for Mr. Berman and the rest of his staff? 
Thank you, 
8/13/2019 3:58 PM >>> 
Supervisory Staff Attorney 
CLC New York 
EFTA00032379

Metropolitan Correctional Center 
150 Park Row 
New York, New York   10007 
>» " 
Adam, 
The list of visitors from our office is below: 
8/13/2019 2:05 PM > » 
As discussed, we would like to see the e  d floor pscyh observation and suicide watch area; the 9th floor SHU, and 
Epstein's cell, which we understand to still be cordoned off. As discussed, we would appreciate if only MCC legal would 
escort us, and we will not speak to any of the guards present given the ongoing investigations. Please give me a call with 
any questions, and let us know what time and where we should go, and if it would be easier for us to enter via the 3rd
floor bridge. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
Tel: 
EFTA00032380
